name: 鄭孟淙
objective:
本課程藉由實地場域踏場及在地對話，導入設計思考與實踐能量，學習如何協助地方擴展並升級形象。課程中可藉由形象設計等手法了解如何提升城市文化的在地體驗，深化地方共同體的歸屬感。修課學生可實際體驗形象塑造之程序及手法，包含參與線上線下設計工作坊、試打樣與製作之程序，可串接未來展示與社造等設計研究相關活動。
This course introduces design thinking and practical energy through field visits and in-situ dialogues and learns how to help expand and upgrade the image of a place. In this course, I will teach image design and other design methods to understand how to enhance urban culture's in-place experience and deepen the local community's sense of belonging. Students can experience image-building procedures and techniques, including participating in online and offline design workshops, trial proofing and production procedures, and connecting with future exhibition and social design research-related activities.
